籤詩版本二:
Izindaba ezivela emkhathizwe zinzima ngempela ukuziqonda. Ungalindeli okuningi kakhulu.
Uma ugaya itshe libe yisibuko, ubuyokwazi ukuthi imizamo yakho iyize.
詩意:
Le hexagram igcina isithombe sokuzola njalo.
Ukuzigcina kuwe kukho konke kuzoletha inhlanhla.
解曰: Zonke izinhlobo zamaqhinga. Ukumosha umzamo. Kungcono ukulondoloza. Siyini isizathu?
籤詩故事一:
◇Intombazane ejinja efuna umyeni
Ngesikhathi sobukhosi bakwa-Qin, lapho uMeng Jiangnu engumbusi wokuqala woBukhosi bakwa-Qin, ngobusuku bomshado wakhe, umyeni wakhe u-Fan Qiliang (Wan Xiliang) waboshwa futhi wathunyelwa ukuba akhe uDonga Olukhulu. UMeng Jiangnu wahamba izinkulungwane zamakhilomitha eyothumelela umyeni wakhe izingubo ezifudumele.Kwamthatha isikhathi eside ukufika e-Great Wall, kodwa ekugcineni watshelwa ukuthi umyeni wakhe wayefile futhi isidumbu sakhe sangcwatshwa ngaphansi koDonga Olukhulu. UMeng Jiangnu wakhihla isililo, uDonga Olukhulu lwabhidlika, futhi izinsalela zomyeni wakhe zatholakala negazi eliconsa enqwabeni yamathambo. Ngakho-ke uQin Shihuang wabiza uMeng Jiangnu, owayethuke waze wafuna ukuthatha uMeng Jiangnu njengesancinza sakhe. UMeng Jiangnu wacela uQin Shihuang ukuthi aye eQinhuang Island ukuze ahloniphe uFan Qiliang, futhi uQin Shihuang wavuma; ngemva kokuba uQin Shihuang ekhulekele. Umlandeli Qiliang, uMeng Jiangnu ubambe isidumbu somyeni wakhe endaweni yeThempeli lase-Meng Jiangnu namuhla. Lapho ebekhona, waziphonsa olwandle khona lapho.
聖意: Ukuvikeleka kwekhaya, ukuzigcina, ingcebo, ibhizinisi, umshado, ukungezwani, abahamba ngezinyawo besifazane eLiujia, amasimu anyakazayo, izikelemu, imfuyo, ukulahlekelwa yimfuyo, ubunzima bokuthola abantu, amacala, ukulahlekelwa, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, ukugula, izinto zokusebenza, ukuthumela Anshan bethuna, inhlanhla
